http Module¶

class bambu.api.auth.http.HTTPAuthentication[source]¶

Bases: bambu.api.auth.AuthenticationBase

Access to the API is granted via HTTP Basic Authentication. If you don’t already have a username and password, you’ll need to sign up for one. You can read the Wikipedia article on HTTP Basic Authentication for more details.

authenticate(request)[source]¶
challenge(request)[source]¶
verbose_name = 'HTTP authentication'¶

class bambu.api.auth.oauth2.OAuthAuthentication[source]¶

Bases: bambu.api.auth.AuthenticationBase

Access to the API is granted via the OAuth protocol. You’ll need to create an app in order to use the API. You can read the Wikipedia article on OAuth for more details.
